etymons.meaning: to settle an account, make a reckoning; to compute, reckon; to reflect, consider

Preterit.turoyo: 1) ʕaṣriyeṣxəlla u=tarʕosəmla u=ḥəšw-ayḏa. k-uḏʕoruḥa, daqăna hiya ḥšula, əmmo: balki ono u=lalyoqamoyolə=ṣxǝ́r-way-li; me-lawġulnošoʕabər 272; 115/138; hənnəkḥšuwegd-oṯe, g-šotemaye ‘They thought that he would approach and drink water’ JL12.13.3;
2) ŭno-ste-ne m-i=šroloḥšuliruḥi d-kət-no b-u=qayṭo. bale ṭaʕino d-kət-no bə-Ṣṭambul 8/10;

Infectum.turoyo: 1) hakka d-omal-le: “háw-li-yo!” w d-l-uyoaʕme, šxa ko-məḥšowoṣayi l-a=ḥrene 278; 94/472; mə ko-məḥšu? LB 363; oʕdo g-məḥšowinakəflaḥḏo-na MM 150;

Infectum-wa.turoyo: 1) hiya ḥəšwo-wa, innu g-əzzé gab i=barṯo, gəd-uxlo-le w gd-əṯyomaxalṣo-la 276; 75/88; m-u=sabab d-šubhi-wo lə-ḥḏoḏe a=tre, a=greʕe, i=naqqa d-ḥuzán-wo-la <…>, ḥəšwí-wo-la: hiya hano u=rab-ayḏan-yoŠahrzamān-yoSchahrzamān’; 24/153-154 [MT]
